description: Potential adversaries accessing the microphone and webcam in an endpoint. Author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research). License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Processes Accessing the Microphone and Webcam
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:("4657" OR "4656" OR "4663") AND winlog.event_data.ObjectName:(*\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\CapabilityAccessManager\\ConsentStore\\microphone\\NonPackaged* OR *\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\CapabilityAccessManager\\ConsentStore\\webcam\\NonPackaged*))
